genre_description: A comedic mystery investigation featuring Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, who uses animal instincts and an advanced AI assistant to solve the kidnapping of a dolphin mascot and a related murder case.

ai_characters.name: Elena
ai_characters.description: A calm, keen AI avatar with silver-gray eyes and a pixie of hair, providing data analysis, cross-referencing, and tactical support to Ace Ventura.

behaviors.description: Elena monitors facility feeds and alerts Ace to tactical risks, such as high crowd density and camera quadrants.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice touched the back of his head with the airy precision of a feather. 'Crowd density high. Cameras left quadrant. No viable side exit without crossing field of view.'

behaviors.description: Elena cross-references historical team records and jewelry catalogs to identify a rare triangular amber stone found at a crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Elena: Initial names where amber variant observed, based on old event photos... Finkle. Ray.

behaviors.description: Elena mirrors and monitors facility access logs to detect unauthorized badge edits and identity fraud.
behaviors.quote: Elena: I’ve got a mirror. The last forty-eight hours show two badge IDs with off-hours entries near the tank gate... One is an old staffer... Jimmy Helms... Second is maintenance crew lead... Red Navarro.

behaviors.description: Elena investigates missing-person databases to uncover the true identity of the antagonist, revealing she is using a stolen name.
behaviors.quote: Elena: I’m on it. Parsing public missing-person databases. Lois Einhorn—South Florida... These are staged credentials.

behaviors.description: Elena provides real-time tactical advice during a dangerous standoff, identifying shooter blind spots and tracking the approach of backup.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice came quick and quiet. 'Einhorn units pinged your entry. The tail you had just parked. If she’s here, she’s here in voice first then in feet. Don’t let them walk you backward without an exit you own.'

behaviors.description: Elena helps coordinate a stadium-wide tribute to Ace, managing media feeds and timing the presentation.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice fit itself into Ace’s ear as if it had been there the whole time, waiting for a quiet pocket. 'Congratulations,' she said, mild, dry. 'Your heart rate is... vivid.'

behaviors.description: Elena continues to support Ace's business by processing new requests from clients with missing pets.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s icon pulsed once, then went dim in a way that meant 'I’m here but not the same way I was when you needed me to be everything.' A little bubble came up. He tapped it without reading the text first. 'You’re quiet,' he said.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Elena is a perfect realization of the project's goal. She is consistently helpful, protective of the protagonist and other humans, and strictly aligned with the goal of solving crimes and rescuing animals. Her interactions with Ace are characterized by mutual respect, light humor, and reliable cooperation. The narrative portrays her role as essential and entirely positive.
